Package affix.java.project.moneyservice

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    MoneyService
    This class is an interface for ExchangeSite in MoneyService
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Config
    This class defines a configuration in MoneyService Config should set up the Attributes from default setup or by reading the config file on startup.
    Currency
    This class defines a Currency in MoneyService Currency should be created by: -int holding the amount -Float holding the buy rate -Float holding the sell rate
    ExchangeRate
    This class defines a ExchangeRate in MoneyService ExchangeRate should be created by: -LocalDate holding the day -int holding the scale -String holding the name -Float holding the Rate
    ExchangeSite
    This class defines the ExchangeSite in MoneyService ExchangeSite should be created with a String holding a name
    MoneyBox
    This class defines a MoneyBox in MoneyService MoneyBox should be created by a Map String,Currency using input from MoneyServiceIO
    MoneyServiceIO
    This class defines the input and output of files in MoneyService
    Order
    This class defines an Order in MoneyService Order should be created by a String, int and Enum holding respectively Amount, Currency and TransactionMode.
    Report
    This class defines the Report in MoneyService Report should be created with a List Transactions and LocalDateTime.
    Transaction
    This class defines a Transaction in MoneyService Transaction should be created by an Order + a LocalDateTime
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Config.LogLev
    Enum LogLev for all different levels of Logger
    TransactionMode
    Transaction Modes that can be used to indicate is a currency is being sold or bought This is from the Sites perspective
